law.catch_line: Notwithstanding § 2-114 of this article, beginning January 15, 2006, from the tax imposed on the he...
law.text: Notwithstanding § 2-114 of this article, beginning January 15, 2006, from the tax imposed on the health insurers under this subtitle, $500,000 shall be distributed annually to the Spinal Cord Injury Research Trust Fund created under § 13-1406 of the Health - General Article.
